attributes.additional_details:
Delta search hides its software (like a virus) in other software packages, it is extremely difficult to remove (for someone who knows how) but there are plenty of websights offering to help remove it for a fee, (and with not much digging) you find without much surprise that these sights are run and owned by Delta search.
There needs to be more government monitoring and assistance against these faceless vulture .com's that pray on those who do not have a technical knowledge to protect themselves.
